views.game

类 ReinforcementView

  • java.lang.Object
    • views.game.ReinforcementView

  • public class ReinforcementView
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ReinforcementView is the view for a part of setup phase and the reinforcement phase in this view players place their given armies one by one on their own countries then reinforcement phase begins
    版本:
    3.0
    作者:
    Mehrnaz, Bingyang ,Parisa
    另请参阅:
    ReinforcementController

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReinforcementView(javax.swing.JPanel controlPanel)
      The constructor of the class which adds the components to the controlPanel and initials the first player for placing his given armies on his countries

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void changeToAttack()
      Make changes on the view of panel when the game phase changes to attack
      int decreaseLeftArmies() 
      void disable() 
      void enable() 
      void exchangeCard()
      Make changes on the view of panel when the game phase changes to reinforcement also checks that if player owns 5 cards, exchanges them for armies
      int getLeftArmies() 
      Player getPlayer() 
      int getPlayerCounter() 
      Country getSelectedCountry() 
      void setLeftArmies(int leftArmies)

      void setPlayerCounter(int counter) 
      void setSelectedCountry(Country country) 
      void showLeftArmies()
      Refresh the number of armies left to assign to countries
      void showPlayer()
      This method is called in setup phase when next player is given the term to place his given armies one by one on his countries
      void updateLabels()
      Update values of labels
